colour.models.RED_COLOR_COLOURSPACE¶

colour.models.RED_COLOR_COLOURSPACE = RGB_Colourspace(REDcolor, [[ 0.699747 , 0.32904693], [ 0.30426404, 0.62364115], [ 0.13491396, 0.03471744]], [ 0.32168, 0.33767], D60, [[ 0.43003595, 0.37007351, 0.15253661], [ 0.20221882, 0.7585289 , 0.03925228], [-0.01769558, 0.08768825, 0.93883251]], [[ 2.96524206, -1.39775269, -0.42333749], [-0.79725965, 1.70055567, 0.05843491], [ 0.13035549, -0.18517977, 1.05171555]], <function log_encoding_REDLogFilm>, <function log_decoding_REDLogFilm>, False, False)¶

REDcolor colourspace.
